parameter.name: unitId
parameter.label: Unit id
parameter.description: Unique id of the unit

parameter.name: minTimeBetweenCalls
parameter.label: Min time between call next
parameter.description: Defines the time that must elapse between two call next on a service point for a specific user (seconds)

parameter.name: storeNext
parameter.label: Store next
parameter.description: Defines if store next is enabled or not

parameter.name: confirmNeeded
parameter.label: Confirm Needed
parameter.description: The visit needs to be confirmed that it has arrived

parameter.name: autoClose
parameter.label: Auto close
parameter.description: Automatically close service point after this time of inactivity (seconds)

parameter.name: singleSession
parameter.label: Single session
parameter.description: Defines if more than one user can be logged in at the same service point.

parameter.name: mdCus
parameter.label: Customer information
parameter.description: Customer information edit/selection

parameter.name: mdMultiServ
parameter.label: Multi Services
parameter.description: The Multi Services Panel and Popup

parameter.name: mdServPool
parameter.label: Counter Pool view
parameter.description: Counter Pool view

parameter.name: mdUserPool
parameter.label: Staff Pool view
parameter.description: Staff Pool view

parameter.name: btnAllQueues
parameter.label: Show All Queues
parameter.description: If enabled, show all queues on the branch.

parameter.name: mdQueues
parameter.label: Queues view
parameter.description: Queues Overview

parameter.name: mdMarks
parameter.label: Custom Marks
parameter.description: To be able to add Marks

parameter.name: marksType
parameter.label: Marks type
parameter.description: Mark type to be used for the custom Marks

parameter.name: multiMarks
parameter.label: Multi Marks
parameter.description: Add a x number of Marks at once

parameter.name: trQueue
parameter.label: Queue transfer controls
parameter.description: Enable/Disable Queue transfer

parameter.name: trUserPool
parameter.label: Staff Pool transfer controls
parameter.description: Make transfer to Staff Pool Controls visible

parameter.name: trServPool
parameter.label: Counter Pool transfer controls
parameter.description: Make transfer to Counter Pool Controls visible

parameter.name: btnTransfer
parameter.label: Transfer Button
parameter.description: Transfer button

parameter.name: btnRecycle
parameter.label: Recycle Button
parameter.description: Button to Recycle a visit

parameter.name: btnRecall
parameter.label: Recall Button
parameter.description: Button to Recall a visit

parameter.name: btnNotes
parameter.label: Notes Button
parameter.description: Edit/Add Notes Button

parameter.name: btnPark
parameter.label: Park Button
parameter.description: Send a customer to your User Pool

parameter.name: btnNoShows
parameter.label: No Show Button
parameter.description: No Show button

parameter.name: btnWalkDirect
parameter.label: Walk In button
parameter.description: Walk In button

parameter.name: btnQueueRemove
parameter.label: Remove from Queue
parameter.description: Remove a specific ticket from the queue

parameter.name: btnQueueTransfer
parameter.label: Transfer from Queue
parameter.description: Transfer a specific ticket from the queue

parameter.name: btnQueueCall
parameter.label: Call from Queue
parameter.description: Call a specific ticket from the queue

parameter.name: btnTransferFirst
parameter.label: Transfer First
parameter.description: Transfer to the first position in the queue

parameter.name: btnTransferLast
parameter.label: Transfer Last
parameter.description: Transfer to the last position in the queue

parameter.name: btnTransferSort
parameter.label: Transfer Sorted
parameter.description: Transfer sorted according to enter time into the queue

parameter.name: allowUserPoolTransfer
parameter.label: Allow Staff Pool transfer
parameter.description: Defines if it is possible to transfer to staff pools on this service point

parameter.name: allowServicePointPoolTransfer
parameter.label: Allow Counter Pool transfer
parameter.description: Defines if it is possible to transfer to counter pools on this service point

parameter.name: idCodeExpressia
parameter.description: Starting ID code for Expressia. Valid values: 1-125.
parameter.label: ID Code Expressia

parameter.name: expressiaMarkName
parameter.label: Expressia mark name
parameter.description: Mark name to be used for Expressia

parameter.name: key1
parameter.label: Expressia Key 1 (Excellent)
parameter.description: Mapping of key 1. Specify the mark code for Excellent.

parameter.name: key2
parameter.label: Expressia Key 2 (Good)
parameter.description: Mapping of key 2. Specify the mark code for Good.

parameter.name: key3
parameter.label: Expressia Key 3 (Acceptable)
parameter.description: Mapping of key 3. Specify the mark code for Acceptable.

parameter.name: key4
parameter.label: Expressia Key 4 (Poor)
parameter.description: Mapping of key 4. Specify the mark code for Poor.

parameter.name: key5
parameter.label: Expressia Key 5 (Unacceptable)
parameter.description: Mapping of key 5. Specify the mark code for Unacceptable.

parameter.name: cfuForceSelection
parameter.description: Must make a selection on the Expressia before ending current visit.
parameter.label: Expressia force selection

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.description: The number of seconds between refreshes

deviceEventHandlers.deviceEventHandler:
String servicePointDevice = "Web service point"
import com.qmatic.qp.api.device.DeviceCommand import com.qmatic.qp.api.connectors.device.ServicePointDeviceResource timerToggleLED = device.getState("TIMER_LEDS_TOGGLE") if(timerToggleLED) { device.getResource("EVENT_SCHEDULER").remove(timerToggleLED) } if(device.getState("LEDS") == "ON") { device.setState("LED_VALUE", 1) device.setState("FLASHES", 0) device.setState("LEDS", event.getParameter("id")) DeviceCommand cmdLEDS = new DeviceCommand(device.getId(), "LEDS_OUTPUT") device.executeCommand(cmdLEDS) expressiaMarkCode = device.getUnit().getConfiguration().get("key"+event.getParameter("id")) spdExpressia = device.getUnit().getDevice(servicePointDevice) DeviceCommand cmdSETMARK = new DeviceCommand(spdExpressia.getId(), "SET_MARK") cmdSETMARK.setParameter("markCode", expressiaMarkCode) device.executeCommand(cmdSETMARK) }

deviceCommandHandlers.deviceCommandHandler: import com.qmatic.qp.api.device.DeviceCommand device.setState("LED_VALUE", 1) device.setState("LEDS", "ON") DeviceCommand cmdLEDS = new DeviceCommand(device.getId(), "LEDS_OUTPUT") device.executeCommand(cmdLEDS)

import com.qmatic.qp.api.device.DeviceCommand device.setState("LED_VALUE", 0) device.setState("LEDS", "ON") DeviceCommand cmdLEDS = new DeviceCommand(device.getId(), "LEDS_OUTPUT") device.executeCommand(cmdLEDS)

unitEvent.name: VISIT_TRANSFER_TO_QUEUE
VISIT_RECYCLE
VISIT_TRANSFER_TO_SERVICE_POINT_POOL
VISIT_TRANSFER_TO_USER_POOL
VISIT_END
VISIT_NOSHOW
USER_SERVICE_POINT_SESSION_END
VISIT_CALL
SET_WORK_PROFILE
CHAT_SEND
